titles.title: Employee Benefit Plan Security and Protection Act of 1994

To amend title I of the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 and the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to clarify provisions governing fiduciary duties in relation to external benefits, social investing, and economically targeted investments.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.
Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and Labor

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Labor-Management Relations.

bill.summary: 9/29/1994--Introduced. Employee Benefit Plan Security and Protection Act of 1994 - Amends the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 (ERISA) and the Internal Revenue Code to revise provisions regarding employee benefit plan fiduciary duties in relation to external benefits, social investing, and economically targeted investments.
